name: Timmy's Christmas Conspiracy
description:
A visual novel about Timmy who is trying to find out who in his family it is that dresses up as Santa Claus each year.  Made for a 2 day game jam.

If you cannot hear voice lines or experience other issues with the web-version we recommend trying a stand alone client below.

Thanks for playing <3

Credits
